name: Hanpro - Luxury Serviced Apartment in Park Hill 3
address: 458 Minh Khai, Hai Ba Trung, Hanoi, Hoang Mai District, Hanoi, Vietnam
hotelDesc:
Hanpro - Luxury Serviced Apartment in Park Hill 3 offers accommodation in Hanoi. Hanpro - Luxury Serviced Apartment in Park Hill 3 features views of the garden and is 2.2 km from Hanoi Creative City. Free WiFi is offered and private parking is available on site.

There is a dining area and a kitchen equipped with microwave. A flat-screen TV is available. Other facilities at Hanpro - Luxury Serviced Apartment in Park Hill 3 include an outdoor pool.

National Museum of Vietnamese History is 3.6 km from Hanpro - Luxury Serviced Apartment in Park Hill 3, while Hanoi Opera House is 3.7 km from the property. The nearest airport is Noi Bai International Airport, 26 km from Hanpro - Luxury Serviced Apartment in Park Hill 3.
